 Boca Raton,Florida -- Vice President Dick Cheney breezed into south Palm Beach County on Friday and gave a speech to nearly 500 Jews, reiterating the Bush administration's support for Israel.
 
 Cheney pledged to remain a strong ally to Israel and focused on the administration's determination to win the war against terror. One of the biggest ovations came when he talked of Bush's "unwavering support for Israel as a vibrant Jewish state."

 Israelis Demolish Palestinian Zoo, Killing Animals
 
 Three American supplied [Caterpillar], remote-controlled D-9 bulldozers smashed their way into the grounds of a small zoo in the Gaza Strip yesterday, busting open cages and demolishing walls.
 
 A menagerie of hundreds of exotic birds was detroyed. All but a few dozen birds escaped or were killed. Corpses of cockatiels, yellow-feathered lovebirds, and other animals litter the grounds as dogs pick at the remains. Foxes, wolves and raccoons are also on the loose, but their chances of surviving in the wild are slim.

 Asma al-Mughair, 16, and her brother Ahmed, 13, died on the roof of their home in the Tel Sultan district of Rafah. Israeli Defence Force soldiers and tanks had just occupied the area.
 
 The children were shot by an Israeli sniper - Asma as she took in laundry, Ahmed as he fed the family pigeons.
 
 Dr Ahmed Abu Nkaria, deputy head of Rafah's tiny hospital, concluded that both children had been killed by single gunshots to the head.

 Teenager shot dead in south Gaza
 
 Israeli soldiers have shot and killed a Palestinian youth in the town of Rafah in the southern Gaza Strip.
 
 Palestinian medical sources said Ahmed Hams died as he tended a friend who had been shot and injured.

 Israeli Soldiers Kill 9-Year-Old Boy
 
 NABLUS, West Bank (AP) - Israeli soldiers on Tuesday shot and killed a 9-year-old Palestinian boy in Nablus as he sat on the front steps of his home eating a sandwich, relatives said.
 
 The troops were enforcing a curfew when they drove by 9-year-old Khaled Usta's home, the boy's aunt, Ferial Usta said. Youths threw stones at the troops, but the group fled when the soldiers got out of the jeep and pointed their guns at a fence just behind the boys, she said.
 
 Khaled was sitting just behind the fence eating a sandwich when one of the soldiers fired his rifle, the aunt said.
